snippet: A new project from Robert Herman explores world cities with images similar to analog work from past decades.
abstract: Photographer Robert Herman has compiled images of street life in New York City and around the world, shot with his iPhone, in book The Phone Book.
lead_paragraph: A new project from Robert Herman explores world cities with images similar to analog work from past decades.

headline.print_headline: Finding It Hip to Be Square
headline.main: Robert Herman Squares New Photos With Past Work, Using an iPhone App
